name: SQUAREHEAD
description: Squarehead is a pixelart-action-jump & run game set in a comic style. You need to shoot, jump & teleport through more than 40 levels. Search forests, caves, deserts and snowy landscapes, to refuel your ship with diamonds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: intel duo core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R5 230 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Amd fx 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1030 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
